name: Vegenant
description:
Play as a Vegenenat, a reckless flower hero who is stuck in an endless loop of insect arenas. Use different seed types with various effects and fight swarms of insect enemies. How far can you get?

How to play

Choose one of the flowers and enter the arena. Try to kill all the enemies in the arena that come in three waves. If you die, you can choose from other flowers. Once you clear the arena, you go to the next one as long as you have some flowers left.

You have limited amount of seeds you can shoot. However, you can collect them where they landed and use them again.

Flowers
  • Fire - AoE damage on hit
  • Poison - leaves damaging pool on the ground
  • Electric - chain lightning on hit
Controls
  • WSAD for movement
  • Mouse move to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot
Credits
  • Jakub Mirovský
  • Vadim Petrov 
  • Michal Schiesl 
  • Jan Slifka
Acknowledgements

Vegenant was created during Ludum Dare 47 as a Jam entry and its source code is publicly available on GitHub.
